[vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1579114611577{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”align-center”][vc_column_inner el_class=”small-order-2 medium-order-1″ animation=”animation left-to-right” offset=”vc_col-md-5″][vc_column_text]
FOUNDER

Julianne Tumwine

Founded and owned by Julianne Tumwine, Belle de Navy is a brand started by one girl and created for all women. 

We draw our inspiration from the strongest of women, to the youngest still figuring out their place in the world…and that’s exactly what we’ve got to offer. 

A brand serving you fashion priced just for you as you fall deeper in love with who you are. 

Shop with us today so you can see firsthand what makes us so special.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”22px”]

0

CUSTOMERS

Satisfied customers and growing

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”small-order-1 medium-order-2″ offset=”vc_col-md-7″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
